1.16.name: wordpress/spell-checker
1.16.description: The Spelling Checker plug-in for WordPress provides a built-in facility for spelling checks on posts from within the administration pages as well as spelling checks on comments via simple calls added to your templates. It requires no changes to the WordPress code-base to use, you merely drop it in to the plug-ins folder and enable it in the interface. This version has been tested in both WordPress 1.2.1 as well as WordPress 1.5 Strayhorn.
